Articles.Content:
Hullo everyone, here's the summary for Squadcast today:

There was no Squadcast due to lack of time.

Summary complete ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
No news = good news
Oh ef ju. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
XDDD lol Nice one
Yeah, he's been busy, also 75 (at last count) new parts.
Wait, April Fools took a 25 or 24 day delay?

> 
> 75 parts? Wow, just wow.

Fun fact: 0.90 has 227 parts which means that's going to be adding roughly 33% more parts than there are currently. I hope there's a manageable sorting method...
If they are working this hard this close to the deadline 1.0 is gonna be a mess.
Someone should try to compile a list of all known new parts, see how many unknown ones that leaves.

> 
> If they are working this hard this close to the deadline 1.0 is gonna be a mess.

I hope not.

> 
> If they are working this hard this close to the deadline 1.0 is gonna be a mess.

He said they're working hard to make it "perfect". Sounds like it's already finished, they're just wrapping up as many bugs as they can now.

That's pretty incredible, and even better since they've fixed a lot of the memory leaks. I guess between the new wings, fairings, landing gear, resources equipment, utility bays and heat shields it makes sense. Am I missing anything?
Great summary! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) 75 new parts, dang.

> 
> That's pretty incredible, and even better since they've fixed a lot of the memory leaks. I guess between the new wings, fairings, landing gear, resources equipment, utility bays and heat shields it makes sense. Am I missing anything?

Theres the minibooster nicknamed 'flea' that was mentioned in a Dev Tuesday and theres the fuel cells that were mentioned a couple times and very likely spotted in a screenshot.
Its actually just 38 parts, maxmaps lied to us!
It's only 38, as it turns out.

20:03 and they haven't put up a countdown post

***ENGAGE PROTESTS! SCANDAL IMMINENT***

> 
> Am I missing anything?

The 1.5m xenon tank? One or more fuel cells. The RT-5 SRB. Even estimating high, that leaves us far short of 75 parts. Interesting.

EDIT: Source for the 38 count? I haven't seen that yet. Sadly, that's slightly lower than my high estimate for what parts we know about.

EDIT2: OK, see it now.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-25T00:12:28Z" title="04/25/2015 12:12  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 25, 2015</time> by Eric S**

If it's 38, then, most of the parts are known, I think.

- - - Updated - - -

From maxmaps: Might be miscounting new cfgs, give me a moment for the accurate part figures, as we added a ton.

Don't screw up, come on.
Probably wings, scanny stuff, or fairing parts.
Some of the new parts are in [this video](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116451-Counting-down-the-days-until-KSP-1-0-Day-3?p=1857561#post1857561).

Embedded here.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/_h0wie2b6fU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
Dres will have asteroids orbiting it/around it. Potatoroids will orbit the Lonely Space Potato.

> 
> Dres will have asteroids orbiting it/around it. Potatoroids will orbit the Lonely Space Potato.

Confirmed??? Where???
